ygData.subject: Re: Observer's Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Wait... Can anyone confirm that the Observer s Staff is 2H Blunt weapon?? I thought I knew that for sure but after thinking about it and checking on it, I
ygData.messageBody:
Wait... Can anyone confirm that the Observer's Staff is 2H Blunt weapon??
I thought I knew that for sure but after thinking about it and checking on
it, I can't confirm.

-----Original Message-----
From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>

Problem is... I don't think you have a piercing upgrade 'til
Stiletto and I
believe that weapon is designed to be too tough to get until
Lvl 40+.
Although the RTS isn't perfect, it is pretty good and does
prepare you (2H
Blunt skill) for the Observer's Staff which I think is
designed for Lvl 30+.


Stats on Oberserver's Staff: Dmg 12, Delay 39, +5 INT, +5
WIS, +30 MANA

This is obviously an excellent weapon to keep in mind...

I think the information we keep seeing here lends credence
to the strategy
of keeping all or at least two of your weapon skills up. I
won't duplicate
that thread here ))

Draco (17) - Veeshan
